name: Tushaar Talwar
message: Hi, I'm Tushaar Talwar, batch of 2009. I used to do web design back then. I'm a non-tech Exun alumni, I did law from NLSIU Bangalore (2014) and worked at a law firm. Now I practice corporate law independently (startups, founders, HNI transactions) and also dabble in some amateur tech projects for specialized use (scraping, filtering, etc). Great to see some familiar names here!

name: Arunim Gupta
message: Hi everyone! I am Arunim Gupta, batch of 2019. I mainly did graphic and 3D designing at my time in Exun. I graduated from IIIT Delhi last year. Currently, I work as an Analyst in Goldman Sachs in Bengaluru, working on ML/DL models for Global Markets Surveillance. Excited to be part of the group and hopefully meet soon!!

name: Anirudh Goyal
message: Hello everyone! I’m Anirudh Goyal from the batch of 2018. I used to do UI/UX and design at Exun. I’m based in San Francisco working as a software engineer in fintech. Let me know if anyone’s in SF! Love the energy here 🥳

name: Vinayak Pachnanda
message: Hi, I’m Vinayak Pachnanda. Batch of 2022. During my time at Exun, I primarily participated in Quizzes and Crosswords. Currently, I’m pursuing an undergraduate degree in Modern History and Philosophy at the University of St Andrews in the UK. So happy to be a part of this network!

name: Ishir Bhardwaj
message: Hi everyone! I'm Ishir Bhardwaj, batch of 2022. I'm currently in my third year at IIIT Delhi, studying computer science and design. Glad to be here!

name: Kaushiv Agarwal
message: Hello Everyone! This is Kaushiv Agarwal, Member Exun Batch of 2018. Currently leading a manufacturing company making smart cooling systems and heat exchangers in Varanasi. Looking forward to connecting back with you all.

name: Mayank Sharma
message: Hello Guys! I'm Mayank Sharma, 2012 batch. I started the hardware benchmarking events for Exun (not sure if it's still a thing though) and used to do a bit of gaming back in the day. I was also Robotics president and held the network & security position for Exun. I'm now working for British Petroleum (London office) in energy trading and risk management—bits of biz and bits of software for the trading floor.

name: Shivinder Pratap Singh
message: Hey Guys.... This is Shivinder Pratap Singh from 2003 Batch... Served with Dabur for 15 years and recently Retired Early. Settled in Chandigarh now - doing some freelance consulting and preparing for my PhD.

name: Rohan Dhar
message: Hey everyone, I’m Rohan Dhar. I was the president of the 2018 batch. I mainly did full-stack web development. I currently work as a software engineer at a HFT firm in London. Really excited to see so many people from so many different batches!

name: Harshikaa Agrawal
message: Hello, I'm Harshikaa Agrawal. I graduated from school in 2023. I'm currently studying Computer Science and Humanities at IIIT Hyderabad. Glad to be here!

name: Tushaar Talwar
message: Hi, I'm Tushaar Talwar, batch of 2009. I used to do web design back then. I'm a non-tech Exun alumni, I did law from NLSIU Bangalore (2014) and worked at a law firm. Now I practice corporate law independently (startups, founders, HNI transactions) and also dabble in some amateur tech projects for specialized use (scraping, filtering, etc). Great to see some familiar names here!

name: Shashwat Mundra
message: Hey everyone, I'm Shashwat Mundra, vice president Exun '22. I used to do quizzing, linguistics, and cryptic hunts during my time at Exun. I'm currently a junior at UIUC studying computer science. Excited to connect with everyone!

name: Tanish Pratap
message: Hi everyone! I’m Tanish, batch of 2015. I’m currently based in Philadelphia, externing with a sustainability-tech startup. I’ll be heading to Chicago in a couple of months to continue my full-time consulting role. Excited to meet you all!

name: Aravind Ashok
message: Hey everyone, great to see you all together! I'm Aravind, Chief Advisor Exun 2020, and I'm currently pursuing my Master's in Communication Science at the University of Amsterdam. Would love to set-up an European meet-up if people are nearby and interested :)

name: Aditya Manglik
message: Hi, I am Aditya Manglik, was a part of Exun 2013. Currently finishing up grad school at ETH Zürich. Happy to connect!

name: Aniket Negi
message: Hello! I'm Aniket, Hardware Head Exun 2022. I'm currently a sophomore at NSUT. Really excited to be a part of the network. Cheers!

name: Sagnik Anupam
message: Hi everyone, I'm Sagnik Anupam, Exun batch of 2020. I used to do quizzing, linguistics, and machine learning at Exun. I recently graduated from MIT, where I studied computer science and math, and I just started my PhD at the University of Pennsylvania studying programming languages and machine learning. Happy to connect with folks, and although I'm based out of Philadelphia, I will be in NYC/Boston frequently.

name: Arsh Malik
message: Hi everyone, I’m Arsh Malik, class of 2021. I used to do full stack dev at Exun. I’m going into my senior year at UCLA, where I’m pursuing my CS degree. Currently, I do research in Quantum Computing and shall be pursuing a PhD in this field in the near future. I’m based out of Los Angeles (SoCal), but I do visit bay area for conferences and meetups. Happy to connect with y’all.

name: Sneha Pandey
message: Hey! I'm Sneha, batch of '24. Currently pursuing my undergrad at IGDTUW. I am interested in finance and startups. I also love to dabble in aerospace and design when I get the chance:). Glad to be here!

name: Dhananjay Bhattacharya
message: Hello fellow Exun Alumni. I am Dhananjay Bhattacharya from the batch of 2024. I am currently pursuing my undergrad in CS from BITS Pilani, Goa Campus. As of now, I have interests in competitive programming and web development, but I am also interested in finance, startups, and entrepreneurship.

name: Alhad Sethi
message: Hi! I'm Alhad, class of 2021. In my final year at IIIT Delhi, interested in math, machine learning, and research.

name: Upamanyu Das
message: Hi guys, I’m Upamanyu Das, Exun batch of 2020. I was in the hardware and audio department and used to make music and DJ for fun. I’m currently a third-year med student at Muzaffarnagar Medical College and have a very strong interest in the application of AI to medicine and want to pursue this as a research career in the future. I’m happy to see so many people from school here again!

name: Areeb Nabi
message: Hi, everyone I'm Areeb from the batch of 2021. Currently in my fourth year of law school at NLSIU. Great to connect with everyone here!

name: Vir Malhotra
message: Hi guys, I’m Vir Malhotra, Exun batch of 2022. I used to be in the Group Discussion department, and am now studying CS and music tech at NYU Abu Dhabi. As of now, I have interests in applied CS to music or finance, but who knows where I’ll end up. I’ll be in New York for the next few months so if anyone is here I would love to chat!

name: Sameer Chadha
message: Hi all, I’m Sameer Chadha, EXUN batch of 2019. I pursued my Undergrad in Economics with a specialization in Finance from NMIMS Mumbai. I’m currently working as a Luxury Real Estate Advisor at Sotheby’s International Realty. I look after markets like Delhi, Mumbai, and Goa and also handle residency by investment. Happy to be here and connect with you all, looking forward to meeting you all in person and having a great time!

name: Tanish Goel
message: Hi everyone, Tanish here, Exun 2020. I studied computing with AI at Imperial College London and I am currently a quant at Goldman Sachs in their systematic trading team. It will be cool to connect with people based in London.

name: Aditya Batra
message: Hey all, I’m Aditya (Exun 2020). I’m currently studying computer science at the University of Waterloo with a specialization in AI and a minor in economics. Happy to connect with everyone!

name: Tanmay Arora
message: Hey everyone! I'm Tanmay Arora (Vice President, Class of 2023). I'm currently majoring in Cyber Physical Systems Engineering at Manipal. During my time at Exun I was mostly involved with the Quiz and Cryptic Hunts departments. I'm a generalist at heart and love to write, travel, run among other things. I'm currently interested in startups, and also writing at my blog: https://tanmay.bearblog.dev. It's really great to connect with everyone here!

name: Pratyush Vempati
message: Hello everyone! I'm Pratyush (President, Class of 2024), doing CS at IIIT Hyderabad now. I'm currently interested in linguistics, anything pure mathematics and complexity theory in computer science (hmu if anyone here is doing anything in research related to these fields; I'd love to have a chat :) ). I probably will pursue a career in research once I figure out exactly which field I want to dive into. I look forward to interacting with you all!! The sheer amount of experience and knowledge here is absolutely mind boggling

name: Samarth Mathur
message: Hey I'm samarth, class of 2009, I was in Seattle the last 6.5 years and moved to Vancouver to do a start up cuz I had the PR and the start up was based in Zurich and I didn't wanna figure out visa stuff. I'm always down for brainstorming start up ideas

name: Sobhagya
message: Hi everyone! I'm Sobhagya, Exun/RKP class of 2011. I live in Oregon, and enjoyed Product management in Marketing Tech, Consumer insights, and now Demand and size forecasting at the Nike WHQ. I'm hitting my 10 year anniversary and mid-life crisis soon, so hit me up if you're in Bangalore/Seattle/Sf and want to exchange restaurant startup ideas, or (non confidential) retail and tech industry knowledge

name: Akshay Gupta
message: Hi folks! I'm Akshay (President, Class of 2016). Currently based out of Seattle, working as an engineer on the Risk & Fraud team at Plaid. Hmu if you're in / visiting Seattle, working in the risk & fraud space or generally want to catch up!

name: Vishesh Balani
message: Hi everyone! I’m Vishesh Balani, Class of 2015. I moved to Chicago/Evanston 3 days ago to pursue my MBA and will be calling it home for the next 2 years. Prior to the move, I’ve worked as a product manager in e-commerce and in consulting. Excited to reconnect with all of you!

name: Shubhaankar
message: Hello everyone! I'm Shubhaankar, head of ML in the batch of 2023. I'm currently a rising 2nd year at UChicago double majoring in CS and Statistics. I'm also pursuing research in machine learning - computer vision, and LLMs, and some quantitative applications in finance. Excited to connect with you all!

name: Kunal Kapila
message: Hi All, I’m Kunal Kapila. (One of the) Head of Programming from the RKP class of 2014. Currently based out of London. I work at a FinTech firm as a software engineer. If any of you are in the UK, or planning a visit here anytime soon, let me know. Would love to catch up over a 🍺 (or five)

name: Aman Gupta
message: Hi All! This is Aman Gupta, Class of 2001. I have had academic training in Engineering, Management, and Law. Worked for a few years in the financial sector, a couple doing a StartUp, and now am in government service with my present posting at Port Blair (albeit my permanent base is in Delhi). I am still open to trying out a few ideas but get stuck in not having a good tech partner. I would be happy to connect with those in Delhi who may have the bandwidth and inclination to explore. Regards

name: Sahil Bajaj
message: Hey everyone, I’m Sahil - class of 2009. Currently based in Oslo! 🇳🇴

name: Sukrit Dewan
message: Sukrit DEWAN  - Exun 2000 (with Ankit and Jawahar). In finance since 2005 and currently working with Barclays (Gursartaj is a colleague) in Hong Kong. Anyone in HK please shout out separately

name: Mohit Sharma
message: Hey everyone! I am Mohit Sharma, Vice President from 2014 batch. I am currently based in Bangalore, working as a Software Engineering Manager at Amazon Payments. Feeling really nostalgic going through the messages and super excited for connecting with all of you ☺️

name: Shantanu Chhabra
message: Hi all, I’m Shantanu Chhabra. Graduated RKP in 2014. Currently in Seattle, but moving to the bay area soon. I work at Apple where I lead the OS Intelligence team. I’m hiring ML Engineers for my team — hmu if you know anyone.

name: Rohit Garg
message: Hi, I’m Rohit (aka RG). ‘07 grad. I live in Seattle, working on my own thing now. Most recently at Google but I quit on April 1st after the Gmail anniversary triggered my mid-life crisis.

name: Karmanya Singh
message: Hi all, Karmanya here! Batch of 2015. I did my electrical engineering from Imperial. Came back to India in 2020 and started Kommit - kommit.com - we started as a patent consulting firm but now do many other things too. I also work with NotarEase (notarease.com) - a legal-tech startup doing online notarisations. Actively involved in Kabaddi - especially England Kabaddi (englandkabaddi.com) Based in Delhi. Happy to catch up!!

name: Tanay Vardhan
message: Hey everyone! I'm Tanay, graduated in 2015. I live in Toronto, working at PayPal as a software engineer. Great to meet you all!

name: Naman Dhingra
message: Hey!! I'm Naman, Exun 2019-20. Just finished my undergrad at NSUT and have started as a Product Engineer at Sprinklr in Gurgaon. Seeing all the introductions and names brought back so many amazing memories. So happy to reconnect!

name: Somesh Kar
message: Hi everyone! I'm Somesh, President '22 with Ashvin. Developer by trade, I tinker with the web, apps, system design, and a bit of hardware. Currently an ECE Major at Shiv Nadar University.

name: Tushit
message: Thanks Ankit for creating the group. Hi.. I'm Tushit, class of 1998. Based out of Bangalore. I recently joined an Indian startup building CMOS Image Sensors & Systems for Defence applications.

name: Bhavya Khandelwal
message: Hey folks! I’m Bhavya, batch of 2019. I did hardware, cryptic hunts and a little bit of everything at Exun. Currently working in software at Flipkart, developing a similar e-commerce product for the South African market, looking forward to connect with you all!

name: Ashay Srivastava
message: Hi Everyone! I’m Ashay Srivastava ’22, and I’m doing CS + Math at the University of Maryland, College Park. I am interested in NLP, vision-based research, and Finance. I’m looking forward to connecting with y’all 🙂

name: Ashvin
message: hey I'm Ashvin, Batch '22 President. Currently studying electrical/physics at Berkeley and dabbling in graphics. No idea where I'm going from here but excited to find out. Really happy to be here :)

name: Sid Nangia
message: Hey folks! Sid Nangia here, graduated 2007. I’m currently in the SF, working at Apple. I run part of the Apple Watch electrical engineering team. Sounds like we need a Bay Area meetup! Happy to help organize it.

name: Gursher Aujla
message: Hello everyone! I'm Gursher Aujla, VP Exun (’18–’19). I recently graduated from BITS Pilani and currently working on Liquid Rocket Engines at Skyroot Aerospace. Really glad this group was created and looking forward to connecting with all of you.

name: Aman Verma
message: Hi, I’m Aman Verma, 2019 Exun VP. I joined Exun in 2013 and was mostly involved with Programming and Cryptic Hunts. Just completed my undergrad from IIT Delhi and about to start as a trader at Jane Street in Hong Kong. Great initiative, would love to connect with Exunites all across the globe!

name: Madhav Shekhar Sharma
message: Hi people! I’m Madhav - b/o 21. I’m just winding up my undergrad in EECS and math at UMich and am working as a robotics engineer in the Bay Area. Great to be here and would love saying hi to anyone close and far :))

name: Vedant Singh
message: Hi everyone! I'm Vedant, doing CS/Math at Stanford rn. I am interested in ML, Crypto and Finance. Looking forward to meet all of you in the Bay Area!

name: Natasha Arya
message: Hi I’m Natasha 👋 I graduated in 2021 from RKP, and just wrapped up my undergrad in CS + Music at UC Berkeley. I’ll be working at Duolingo in NYC soon, would love to say hi to people around once I move :) Thanks for making this group!

name: Mehul Srivastava
message: Hello everyone 😄 I'm Mehul Srivastava (Class of 2023). I am currently pursuing a CS major at HKU. Would love to meet y'all :)

name: Aarshia Gupta
message: Hi! I’m Aarshia, Class of 2023. I’m a Data Science major at UC San Diego. Excited to be here!

name: Pratishtha Batra
message: Hi everyone! I'm Pratishtha, batch of 2023. I'm currently pursuing Electronics and Communication Engineering at IGDTUW. I was in group discussion at Exun and enjoy debating. Photography and filmmaking are the two hobbies I love spending time on. Really glad to be here!

name: Nitin Gupta
message: Hi! I’m Nitin Gupta, Class of 1997. Having own business settled in Gurgaon.

name: Pulkit Garg
message: Hey! I’m Pulkit Garg, Class of 2022. I did game development and a bit of everything else too at Exun. Currently, I'm at UWaterloo studying CS and Cognitive Science with a specialization in fine arts.

name: Kanishka Verma
message: Hi! I'm Kanishka Verma, Exun 2020-24. I had the best four years doing different things at Exun, managing events, making friends and getting to know more about what I like to do. I love designing, debating, organizing events and well, talking & listening :p. Currently taking a year off to focus and reset. Extremely grateful to be here and I look forward to learning a lot from you all!

name: Vishesh Saraswat
message: Hi this is Vishesh, I graduated in 2023. I’m currently at IIITH.

name: Aaryak Garg
message: Hey, I’m Aaryak. Was part of Exun - 2016-2020. Think I contributed in almost every dept (except GD :P). Enjoyed cryptic hunts the most. Miss sitting in Egurukul and doing the hunts with the whole team. I am APM @Predii - involved in the automotive industry, trying to help the aftersales & aftermarket. Love this, thanks for having me!

name: Kavin Valli
message: Hey everyone! Kavin this side (Class of 2023). Currently doing Computer Engineering at UWaterloo.

name: Aadhya Dhar
message: Hello! I’m Aadhya (Class of 2023) and I’m an undergraduate student at Lady Shri Ram College!

name: Siddhartha Verma
message: Hello, I'm Siddhartha (Class of 2024). I'm at VIT Vellore pursuing Mechanical Engineering and currently building Tarmac Media.

name: Sneha Chandra
message: Helloo, I'm Sneha. I graduated in 2023. I'm at NTU Singapore doing Materials Science.

name: Shireen Rajora
message: Hi everyone, I’m Shireen (Class of 2023) and I’m doing my undergrad at UWaterloo.

name: Ritin Pachnanda
message: Hey, I’m Ritin Pachnanda! Exun 2014-19. Graduated from UPenn last year and now I’m back in Delhi working on mrmr.social with Avi Chandra. Super excited for this!

name: Shashwat Goel
message: Hey, I'm Shashwat, Exun 2014-19. Over these years, I had a blast trying a bunch of things, eventually converging on programming and NLP. Graduated from IIIT Hyderabad, I'll now be doing a PhD in Deep Learning at the Max Planck Institute in Tübingen Germany. Really cool to be here.

name: Rajat Sodhi
message: Hello, this Is Rajat, I graduated 1999 batch. I am an architect and live in New Delhi. Currently I am a Professor teaching Design at Sushant University in Gurugram. My work is based around the field of biomimicry - using algorithms and computational design to mimic natural phenomenon and use that to create architectural form. I’ve built 3D printers and research robotic fabrication. Also a part time carpenter and happy to be here :)

name: Angad Singh
message: Hi! I’m Angad, I graduated in 2022 and I’m an undergrad at Ashoka University.

name: Manas
message: Hello this is manas. I was Exun 95-2001. I went to NSIT Delhi and then to grad school at MIT Media Lab and was a PhD student at UC Berkeley CS. I work at Uber where I lead our advertising and membership products.

name: Madhav Narayan
message: Hi there! I’m Madhav from the batch of 2015. Barely an Exun member, my stint last around two months (joined at the end of 12th, Exun (e)Lite?), but I have fond memories of the many member friends and seniors who supported and included me in all the fun tech stuff throughout. Recently moved to London where I work as a software engineer. Excited to meet you all virtually and in person sometime!

name: Rudraneel Sinha
message: Hi! I’m Rudraneel, graduated from RKP in 2022. I used to be a 3D modeller in Exun in addition to handling SpaceTech. Currently a CS major at Purdue doing research on finding GPU architectural optimisations for differentially private ML. Excited to be a part of this group, many memories with the club!

name: Diwank
message: Hi hi. Diwank here. Living in nyc. Working on an AI startup — julep.ai

name: Shubham Goel
message: Hi guys :) I’m Shubham Goel.  Graduated from RKP in 2012. In between things right now, but my last job was building a company called Affinity.co in the US for the last decade. Excited for this group!!

name: Gaurav Lochan
message: I'm Gaurav Lochan. I graduated in 1995. I live in Palo Alto and work as a director of engineering for PhonePe (in the US).

name: Udai P
message: Will be great to reconnect. I don't even remember much but we graduated 1999 and used to prank Mukesh sir and spy on him as he sang Mukesh songs secretly in the server room.

name: Krithika Rangarajan
message: Hello hello, thank you for getting this group together .. I am Krithika Rangarajan- Exun batch of 2004 . I’m now an associate professor of Radiology in AIIMS Delhi, great to meet you all !

name: Udit Mehrotra
message: Hello everyone, I am Udit Mehrotra, Class of 1998. Don't remember what I did at Exun exactly , but it was a lot of fun 🙂 glad to be here! based in new delhi

name: Mrinal Sinha
message: Hello Exun alums 😊. This is Mrinal Sinha, Class of 1997. How are you @Udit Mehrotra ?

name: Mohit Taneja
message: Hello hello, Mohit Taneja 2007, I am in Austin, Texas. I work as a Product Manager at Arm, and help define our data center and 5G/6G IP roadmaps.

name: Aarman Roy
message: Hi realize I didn’t give an introduction: im Aarman, I graduated in 2014 from RKP. I live in NYC rn and work as a designer at an ad agency called Mojo Supermarket (no it’s not a supermarket haha)

name: Ananay Arora
message: Hi everyone! I'm Ananay - President, Class of 2016-17. I'm currently working at Legix as a founding engineer based in Phoenix, AZ. Fun fact - I love to DJ as a hobby. Looking forward to meeting you all!

name: Bharat Kashyap
message: Thanks Ankit for taking the lead on this! I'm Bharat, President in 2015. Engineer in open-source dev tools currently, worked in tech for consulting before this. Very excited to have the alumni group going :)

name: Jawahar
message: 2000 Vice President along with Ankit. These days, I work on incubating newer business within larger companies, currently in media and streaming, previously Samsung. Maryland/Stern alum (and IIT dropout?) Residing in the NYC area. Always happy to connect

name: Prannay Khosla
message: 2014-15, currently an Entrepreneur as well, based out of SF. Worked in self driving and HFT before this. IIT 2019.

name: Gursartaj Singh Nijjar
message: 2007, President alongside Working at barclays in the M&A team in Mumbai. Studied at stephens/iim bangalore Been mostly in finance since 2010! Great to finally having our own alumni network!

name: Aryaman Chandra
message: Hi! I am Aryaman Chandra. Exun 2022 - I am currently a student and a freelance developer and designer

name: Ankit Wadhwa
message: 2000, President - now an entrepreneur, having built and exited two sizable tech companies. Currently working on my third venture in crypto. I spent 7 years in consulting before transitioning to entrepreneurship. I'm an IIT/Wharton alum and a proud father of a 5-year-old. Always happy to connect—feel free to reach out!
